name: USMC - SEMPER FIDELIS Performance Hooded Sweatshirt
description:
It’s Latin for “Always Faithful” and the motto of every United States Marine. Show off your pride in being one of our Nation’s Finest Warriors with our USMC-SEMPER FIDELIS Performance Hooded Sweatshirt! 

These hooded sweatshirts are 8 ounces, 100% polyester fleece, moisture-wicking, smooth durable exterior with a soft brushed inner layer. A front pouch pocket, and is anti-pill. This sweatshirt is also 100% authorized by the United States Marine Corps Licensing and Trademark Office.

The USMC-SEMPER FIDELIS Performance Hooded Sweatshirt features two separate graphics, one on the front and one on the back. The front features the words SEMPER FIDELIS and a faded USMC behind it, all above and Eagle, Globe and Anchor. On the back, just below the collar, features the Devil Dog Graphix logo.

Available in black.

SIZE CHART 
S-     Chest: 40    Length: 27     Sleeves: 34
M-    Chest: 44    Length: 28     Sleeves: 35
L-     Chest: 48    Length: 29     Sleeves: 36
XL-   Chest: 52    Length: 30     Sleeves: 37
XXL- Chest: 56    Length: 31     Sleeves: 38

*No returns or exchanges will be accepted once the garment has been worn and/or washed.

name: EARNED. NEVER GIVEN. USMC T-Shirt
description:
It cannot be bought, rented or sold, only earned with heart and desire to be the best. It is the title United States MARINE! Show your pride in earning this coveted title with our EARNED. NEVER GIVEN. T-Shirt! 

These shirts are 100% combined ring spun US cotton, and are preshrunk so the fit you get when you first put it on, lasts wash after wash after wash. The quality is evident with double-needle stitching in the sleeves and bottom hem, seamless collarette and made in the USA from imported fabric. This shirt is also 100% authorized by the United States Marine Corps Licensing and Trademark Office.

The EARNED. NEVER GIVEN. T-Shirt features a large two color graphic on the front. These shirts are available only in red.

SIZE CHART (Chest size)
Small:       33-36
Medium:   37-40
Large:       41-44
X-Large:   45-48
XX-Large: 49-52

*No returns or exchanges will be accepted once the garment has been worn and/or washed.

name: USMC - SEMPER FIDELIS Performance Long Sleeve Shirt
description:
It’s Latin for “Always Faithful” and the motto of every United States Marine. Show off your pride in being one of our Nation’s Finest Warriors with our USMC - SEMPER FIDELIS performance long sleeve shirt! 

These shirts are made from 100% polyester, moisture-wicking material. The same type of feel of Under Armour. They have an athletic fit, double-needle stitched crew neck, open cuffs and hen, tagless. Great for working out or any outdoor activity. This shirt is also 100% authorized by the United States Marine Corps Licensing and Trademark Office.

The USMC - SEMPER FIDELIS performance long sleeve Shirt features two separate graphics, one on the front and one on the back. The front features the words SEMPER FIDELIS and a faded USMC behind it, all above and Eagle, Globe and Anchor. On the back, just below the collar, features the Devil Dog Graphix logo. This performance long sleeve shirt is only available in black.

SIZE CHART (Chest size)
Small:       34-36
Medium:   37-40
Large:       41-44
X-Large:   45-48
XX-Large: 49-52

*No returns or exchanges will be accepted once the garment has been worn and/or washed.

These hooded sweatshirts are 8 ounces, 100% polyester fleece, moisture-wicking, smooth durable exterior with a soft brushed inner layer. A front pouch pocket, and is anti-pill. This sweatshirt is also 100% authorized by the United States Marine Corps Licensing and Trademark Office.

The USMC-EGA Performance Hooded Sweatshirt features two separate graphics, one on the front and one on the back. The front features a large Eagle, Globe & Anchor, above the initials USMC and the term SEMPER FIDELIS. On the back, just below the collar, features the Devil Dog Graphix logo.

name: USMC-SEMPER FIDELIS "Blood Stripe" Ball Cap
description:
The "Blood Stripe," is worn on the Marine Dress Blue Trousers by NCOs, Staff NCOs and Officers, honors the Marines that fought at the battle of Chupultapec during the Mexican War. We continue to honor the Marine Corps and their courage with our USMC-SEMPER FIDELIS "Blood Stripe" Ball Cap.

This classic cut, Chino, cotton twill, unstructured ball cap features an embroidered design on the front. It is 100% washed cotton, 6-panel, low profile cap. It features a curved bill, triple stitched sweatband, matching velcro closure. One size fits all. Great for both men and ladies! 

This hat is also 100% authorized by the United States Marine Corps Licensing and Trademark Office.


Available in Navy Blue.

*No returns or exchanges will be accepted once the garment has been worn and/or washed.

name: U.S. MARINES - FORCE IN READINESS Performance Long Sleeve Shirt
description:
We are America's 911 Force. Ready to go in a moments notice. Show your pride in being part of our nation's on call rapid response warrior unit with our US MARINES - A FORCE IN READINESS Performance Long Sleeve Shirts! 

These shirts are made from 100% polyester, moisture-wicking material. The same type of feel of Under Armour. They have an athletic fit, double-needle stitched crew neck, open cuffs and hen, tagless. Great for working out or any outdoor activity. This shirt is also 100% authorized by the United States Marine Corps Licensing and Trademark Office.

The US MARINES - FORCE IN READINESS Performance Long Sleeve Shirt features two separate graphics, one on the front and one on the back. The front features the an Eagle, Globe and Anchor in front of words US MARINES. EST. 1775. A FORCE IN READINESS which are faded and distressed in the background. On the back, just below the collar, features the Devil Dog Graphix logo. This performance long sleeve shirt is only available in black.

name: USMC WARRIOR BUILDER T-Shirt
description:
Whether your Marine Corps career started at Parris Island, Quantico, or San Diego, you were transformed from a civilian into one our nation's finest Warriors. Now show off your pride in being one of the "Nation's Finest" with our USMC WARRIOR BUILDER t-shirts!

These shirts are super-soft 94% ringspun cotton and 6% ringspun organic cotton blend, and are preshrunk so the fit you get when you first put it on, lasts wash after wash after wash. The quality is evident with double-needle stitching throughout, seamless rib at the neck and shoulder-to-shoulder taping. This shirt is also 100% authorized by the United States Marine Corps Licensing and Trademark Office.

The USMC WARRIOR BUILDER T-Shirt features a large two color graphic on the front. These shirts are available black.

SIZE CHART (Chest size)

X-Large:   45-48
2X-Large: 49-52

*No returns or exchanges will be accepted once the garment has been worn and/or washed.

name: U.S. MARINES AUTHENTICS Hooded Sweatshirt
description:
From the moment you stepped off the bus and onto those yellow footprints, you began your journey to become one of the Nation's Finest Warriors. Now show your pride in being one of the few and the proud with our US MARINES AUTHENTICS hooded sweatshirt!

These hooded sweatshirts are 100% polyester, moisture management fleece, with paneled shoulders for maximum movement and texture waffle-weave side and underarm panels. A front pouch pocket with two velcro closure top pockets, hood draw cord, ribbled cuffs and waistband.
This shirt is also 100% authorized by the United States Marine Corps Licensing and Trademark Office.

The US MARINES AUTHENTICS hooded sweatshirt features a large two color graphic on the front.

SIZE CHART (Chest size)

X-Large:   45-48
2X-Large: 49-52

*No returns or exchanges will be accepted once the garment has been worn and/or washed.

name: ENDURING FREEDOM VETERAN Long Sleev Shirt
description:
You served with honor and pride in the deserts and mountains of Afghanistan, now show off your pride in the streets of the USA with our ENDURING FREEDOM VETERAN long sleeve shirts!

These long sleeve shirts are super-soft 94% ringspun cotton and 6% ringspun organic cotton blend, and are preshrunk so the fit you get when you first put it on, lasts wash after wash after wash. The quality is evident with double-needle stitching throughout, seamless rib at the neck, shoulder-to-shoulder taping and rib knit cuffs.

The ENDURING FREEDOM VETERAN Long Sleeve Shirt features two separate graphics, one on the front and one on the back. The front features the title “ENDURING FREEDOM VETERAN” with smaller text below reading “WE SERVED WITH HONOR AND PRIDE” and a small American flag underneath, all in front of a faded image of a grunt taking a knee. On the back, just below the collar, features the Devil Dog Graphix logo. These long sleeve shirts are available in both white and smoke.

SIZE CHART (Chest size)
Small:       34-36
Medium:   37-40
Large:       41-44
X-Large:   45-48
2X-Large: 49-52

*No returns or exchanges will be accepted once the garment has been worn and/or washed.
